statements.sql: select `A`.*, `B`.`title`, `B`.`description`, `B`.`contents`, `B`.`meta_seo` from `pages` as `A` left join `page_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`page_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`type` = 'index' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 1

statements.sql: select `A`.`id`, `A`.`link`, `A`.`image`, `A`.`alt`, `A`.`updated_at`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug`, `B`.`description` from `posts` as `A` left join `post_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`post_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`id` != '49' and `A`.`category_id` = '1' and `A`.`type` = 'tin-tuc' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 15
